pages.title: Boba Tracker
pages.content: Boba Tracker is an app for tracking boba orders and spending. With the ability to set spending limits, Boba Tracker helps users budget themselves.

pages.title: Adding Orders
pages.content: Boba Tracker gives the option to manually add an order or to scan a receipt. Orders can be edited later on through the app.

pages.title: Budgeting
pages.content: Boba Tracker automatically logs and tracks daily and monthly spending. This data is securely saved on a Google Firebase Database and only accessible through the app.

footer.blurb: Check out the public components of Boba Tracker in my GitHub repository!
